title: The Cornet of Horse
description: Unedited, unabridged, original format editions with original colored cover art, these Henty books reproduce the original in careful detail. Rupert Holiday flees England as a result of a fight with his stepbrother and joins Marlborough during his campaign in the Netherlands. Set during the battles of Blenheim, Ramillies, Oudenarde, and Malplaquet, Rupert has many successful adventures before marrying a French girl and settling down in England.
author: G.A. Henty
